This is a good quick game to play with your friends and mess around with! Running away from the classic old-school horror movies, for fans and people who enjoys the aesthetic that the games provides it's wonderful.
I recommend everyone to give it a try, the gameplay itself its limited and repetitive for the most part, it just depends in who are you playing with and who is the chaser that can give you a different playstyle.
Had good times with this and I only recommend playing with someone, alone can be quite unfortunately (well..mostly)

Excellent Escape Game avec des mises à jour régulières depuis plusieurs années maintenant. Le rapport qualité-prix est plus qu'intéressant (moins de 5 euros sur plusieurs sites tiers).

Le seul petit défaut que je soulignerai est le problème d'accès aux parties selon votre fournisseur d'accès. Je suis chez Bouygues et pendant pas mal de temps, j'ai dû installer NetLimiter pour jouer le tueur. Certains de mes amis n'arrivent pas à jouer même en survivants ce qui est quand même dommageable.

Malgré ça, je le recommande fortement si vous avez envie d'un Escape Game et que vous hésitez encore !
No spoko gierka co więcej jak jestes gościem bez przyjaciół grasz killerem, a jak masz kogoś do gry to lecisz na ocalałego i tyle :)

Gówno. Wkurwia niemiłosiernie, a najgorsze jest to, że wydajesz miliony na to ścierwo, a mógłbyś przeznaczyć te pieniądze na pieski w schronisku albo na tace w kościele. Ta gra niszczy totalnie wizerunki takich postaci jak Majers. Teraz zamiast widzieć w nim tajemniczego morderce widzę w nim kurwa gówno z nożem, które odpierdala moonwalk. Dobrze, że licencji na Jasona nie dostali, bo to byłaby przesada. Ogólnie gra, która jebie w dupę logikę i racjonalne myślenie. Gra w której, umięśniony streetfighter nie może nic zrobić chłopczykowi  z nożem kurwa, no chyba, że masz d-strike... Gra tak niezbalansowana, że zanim kurwa zdążysz powiesić na haku pierwszego surva, to 5 generatorów będzie już dawno zrobione. Granie killerem już dawno straciło zabawę. Teraz się tylko wkurwiasz. Nie polecam.

The game has a very steep skill curve, some tech that is usually never explained, and strats that seem so far-fetched that they somehow still end up working. If you get this and feel like you're not good enough, don't listen to that voice! Keep trying, keep going, level up your survivor/killer, you will get better, as the perks available to you continue to grow stronger, more synergetic with another, and you can do that loop confidently! You WILL be good, and you will LOVE this game, if you enjoy the kind of game it is!

First 20-40 hours suck because you have to grind out perks, especially on survivor side. Once you get past that, the game gets really fun as you learn the new techs and start to grind out your skill in movement and awareness. The community can be toxic or wholesome but you can control the interaction usually. Overall a fun game, if you're looking to sink your life into something for a bit.

很早之前另一个号玩过，那时候游戏还挺不错，除了自己菜没什么毛病，当时我是推荐的，现在皮肤更新太快了，BUG一大堆也不先想办法优化，短短一年游戏容量从18G变成30G，电脑也渐渐带不动了，当年我还能最高画质60帧玩的，现在低画质都各种掉帧，无法存档，段位更新失败，出现位置错误，请检查你的路由器设置，出新内容就省省吧，新人越来越赶不上，再不停下来做优化这游戏两年内必亡。

很久没玩了，想起来写个评测，怎么说呢，老玩家可能需要一个怀旧服，差不多出护士那个版本，人和屠夫都能玩。人类弱势是可以理解的，独狼玩家毕竟少，但是砍成纯躲猫猫也就劝退了独狼人类，朋友总有离去的时候，有时候你总要一个人站在屠夫面前，绕墙心理战是真的刺激，屠夫抓人的成本无非也就时间，胜利的目标也不是4杀
毁灭改了之后人类无限速修，屠夫被迫打针对，导致最后人屠分数都不高而且游戏体验极其糟糕！速修不改游戏必凉！

こんなク〇ゲーに金を使うならもっとほかのことに使うことをオススメします。
まずこのゲーム、殺人鬼とのチェイスや、発電機を直して脱出する、というここまでゲーム性の高いゲームは初めてでした。
ですが、いざやってみると、フリーズ、マッチングしないバグやロード中に落ちるなどのバグが起き、まともにプレイできない状態です。特に、殺人鬼側でプレイしてるときなどによくフリーズがおきます。ほぼ高確率でフリーズします。
とにかくバグがひどいです。修正お願いします。

Years after release and still a shit broken game. I took a break for a whole year because the gameplay became so frustrating and repetitive with no other gamemodes to choose from. I was bored and wasn't having any fun anymore. Came back thinking OH maybe they fixed some shit and made it more fun! NOPE. 
It's still as buggy, laggy, and unbalanced as it was a year ago with a playerbase thats continuing to dwindle little by little. Didn't even take me 2 hours to uninstall it again, they've fixed NOTHING.

of course, DLC killers are all broken and overpowered and the ranking system is still very easily abused with players teaming up with players at a lower rank in order to boost themselves by getting easier killers to play against. It took 5 to 10 minutes just to get into a lobby for each match. Out of the roughly 10 games I played tonight, only ONE of them had a proper conclusion with the others being DCs or a dropped connection. There's NO penalty for players dropping out besides a 5 minute wait time, which is nothing because it takes that long just to get into another match anyway.

Don't even get me started on the actual game which is STILL a mess. Lagswitching is still a rampant issue and glitches/bugs are always being exploited. They added a timer at the end of a match when a door is opened, which makes it even easier for one teammate to fk over all the others in a game about working together. The heartbeat mechanic (which is basically the only way you'll ever be able to outrun or hide from the killer) always breaks and then you cant hear it. Killers can still lag out and hit you when you're 10 feet from them. Every single issue I quit the game due to is STILL in the game. 
The only effort they seem to put into this game is the DLC and cash shop items...

I used to play this game all the time. Now I'm probably never coming back to it and good riddance,
